items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals higher open for Sensex, Nifty; Asian markets gain
items.description: Stock Market Today: GIFT Nifty futures, trading around 60 points ahead, indicated markets in India were likely to start on a positive note on Monday.

items.title: Bond bulls bet on RBI's dovish turn to extend rally amid policy shift
items.description: While interest-rate swaps are pricing a rate cut only in December, traders are girding for a possible shift in the RBI's stance to neutral

items.title: FTSE Russell Index revamp has S Korean, Indian bond markets on watch
items.description: FTSE Russell will on Oct. 8 announce any inclusions into benchmarks including its World Government Bond Index, which tracks $29 trillion of global fixed income

items.title: Technical indicators show strong support for Nifty: Is it time to buy dips?
items.description: The Nifty 50 Index is experiencing a downward trend in the near term. However, the index is approaching a strong support zone at 24,800

items.title: Share Market Today: RBI MPC meet, Q2 earnings, Middle East war, Oil, FIIs
items.description: At 6:40 AM, GIFT Nifty futures were trading 89 points higher at 25,262 levels, suggesting a robust opening for the markets.

items.title: These are top two stocks recommended by Rajesh Bhosale of Angel One
items.description: Since the March swing lows, prices of JK Paper saw a strong rally, doubling from Rs 320 to Rs 640. However, over the last couple of months, prices entered a correction phase

items.title: Stocks to Watch: HDFC Bank, Adani Wilmar, REC, Adani Total, Canara Bank
items.description: Stocks to Watch: Life Insurance Corporation of India has increased its shareholding in Bank of Maharashtra from 4.05 per cent to 7.10 per cent following the allotment of shares during a QIP.

items.title: SBI Card, SDBL, BoB; top stocks by Jigar S Patel of Anand Rathi for Oct 7
items.description: After peaking around 817, SBICARD saw a steep drop of nearly 78 points, marking a significant decline of around 10 per cent in its value

items.title: India's equity-market valuation premium over China narrows to 54.2%
items.description: Equity market trend attributed to faster growth in India Inc earnings

items.title: Check FIIs, DIIs, retail positions in F&O post Nifty biggest weekly fall
items.description: Derivatives market update for Oct 07: FIIs long-short ratio in index futures further falls to 1.4, down 300 bps in last 4 trading sessions; retail investors turn bullish after more than a month.
